recipe_name: Warm potato salad with herb dressing
author: Garrey Dawson
method: In a bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar and Dijon mustard. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste, and stir in the chives. Stir the warm cooked new potatoes into the dressing and serve warm.
ingredients: 5 tbsp olive oil,  2 tbsp white wine vinegar,  1 tbsp Dijon mustard,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  2 tbsp chopped fresh chives,  200g/7oz new potatoes, cooked and halved, still warm
